H0.text: what country shares borders with both belarus and romania. Poland

H3.text: what country shares borders with both belarus and romania. Ukraine

A4.text: Ukraine also borders Belarus to the north; Poland and Slovakia to the west; Hungary, Romania and Moldova to the southwest; and the Black Sea and the Sea of Azov to the south and southeast.
